description:
Kimizuki Shihou is http://anidb.net/ch70947 [Hyakuya Yuuichirou]`s brother-in-arms in the Moon Demon Company. He is clear-headed and has excellent combat ability, but is cynical and gets treated as a troublemaker. He has a http://anidb.net/ch76397 [bedridden sister], and enlisted in the army in order to allow her to undergo the treatment.
Source: Official Website
name: Kimizuki Shihou
